attributes.action: Review childcare support from child's age of 0
attributes.additional_details: Support working parents with child care costs as the cost is way to high. If to take a house hold with both working parents, this cost could take nearly up to 50% of total household income, full time childcare cost is way to high to afford a quality live for working parents. It puts under the pressure working parents adding unnecessary stress to them. Nursery is a vital part of child's development to socialise and develop so much needed socialising skills.
attributes.background: Working full time, minimum 30hrs (each parent) per week parents to receive 30 hours free childcare from child's age of 0-4 years.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petitions currently open on this topic:

Commission an independent review of childcare funding and affordability
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586700

Provide free childcare to working parents for children over 9 months.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580622
